summary: A put-upon teen finds himself reliving the same miserable Christmas day over and over again.
cast: Zachary Gordon|Molly Parker|Rick Roberts|Wesley Morgan|Peter DaCunha|Marshall Williams|Jacob Kraemer|Bailee Madison|Bruce Dern|Victoria Fodor|Vince Groulx|Lynne Deragon|Racine Bebamikawe|Randy Brown|Jai Ganatra|Alyssa Piazza|Tammy-lynn Wilcox|W. Steven Wright
title: Las Navidades de Pete
